title: Love in a Cold Climate
creator_credit: Tom Hooper, Kate Harwood and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Love In A Cold Climate is the story of three girls and their journey into adulthood. What is most important to Polly, Fanny and Linda is their launching into society where they hope to meet future husbands and fall in love along the way. Set in England in the early 1930’s we meet the eccentric families of the girls and travel between the country houses of England to the drawing rooms of London’s high society all in the pursuit of love. Cast includes Elisabeth Dermot-Walsh, Rosamund Pike, Megan Dodds, Anthony Andrews, Alan Bates.
